snippet.title: Deep Space Gardening (2019)
snippet.description:
Deep Space Gardening is a cooperative multiplayer game. Every player has its own character walking on a spherical map. The goal is to grow plants and fulfil the deliveries to the surrounding planets before the time runs out. Plants can be grown by combining berries to craft seeds, and then plant, water and fertilize them until their fully grown. When the time is up the game is over and a high score for delivered plants is displayed.

by Maria Vila, Berkay Berabi, Nicholas Ingulfsen, Johannes Koeberle, Sha Liu
